conversation.text: So you're looking for more crime thrillers like those from 1976, with a hint of French flair and perhaps some edgy cinematography? I'd recommend "The Bourne Identity" (1980) - this classic adaptation of Robert Ludlum's novel features gritty action, amnesia-fueled mystery, and Matt Damon in an early role. Alternatively, if you're up for some 90s nostalgia, "Point Break" (2015) delivers over-the-top stunts, a dash of surfing coolness, and a memorable performance from Patrick Swayze.

shift_events.to_anchor: A Good Day to Die Hard

shift_events.from_anchor: A Good Day to Die Hard
